snippet: Owen Labrie, a St. Paul’s School graduate, faces lifetime registration as a sex offender after a judge on Tuesday upheld his conviction for using a computer to lure a girl to a sexual encounter.
abstract: New Hampshire Judge Larry Smukler of Merrimack County Superior Court upholds felony conviction for Owen Labrie, St Paul’s School graduate, who used a computer to lure younger classmate into sexual encounter and faces lifetime registration as a sex offender.
lead_paragraph: Owen Labrie, a St. Paul’s School graduate, faces lifetime registration as a sex offender after a judge on Tuesday upheld his conviction for using a computer to lure a girl to a sexual encounter.
